lead_paragraph: Meaghan Francella made a 4-foot birdie putt and beat Annika Sorenstam on the fourth hole of a playoff yesterday to win the rain-delayed MasterCard Classic in Huixquilucan, Mexico, for her first L.P.G.A. victory. Francella, 24, making only her sixth start on the Tour, closed with a three-under 69 for an 11-under 205. Sorenstam, making her first start of the season, had four birdies on the front nine and three more on the back before taking a bogey-5 at the 16th. She finished with a 66.
